TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers

Class ConnectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ConnectionController

  • public class ConnectionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles connection, connection loss, reconnection, and disconnection. Tasks that require a connection are added to a queue here, and are then handled. If there is no connection, then connection is re established before the tasks are handled. These tasks are handled on a separate thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConnectionController.TaskThread
      Implementation of the task thread, which is used to complete tasks on a separate thread, as well as to ensure that there is always a connection, reconnect, and disconnect.
